mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_id AS empId, e.emp_name AS empName, e.emp_no AS empNo, e.emp_address AS empAddress, e.emp_email AS empEmail, e.emp_joined AS empJoined, e.annual_leave AS annualLeave, e.used_annual_leave as usedAnnualLeave, e.emp_pwd AS empPwd, e.profile AS profile, e.emp_phone AS empPhone, e.dept_code AS deptCode, d.dept_name AS deptName, e.position_value AS positionValue, p.position_name AS positionName, e.view_auth AS viewAuth FROM employee e , tbl_dept d, tbl_position p where e.dept_code = d.dept_code and e.position_value = p.position_value
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET emp_name = #{empName}, emp_no = #{empNo}, emp_address = #{empAddress}, emp_email = #{empEmail}, emp_joined = #{empJoined}, annual_leave = #{annualLeave}, emp_pwd = #{empPwd}, profile = #{profile}, emp_phone = #{empPhone}, dept_code = #{deptCode}, position_value = #{positionValue}, view_auth = #{viewAuth} WHERE emp_id = #{empId}
